name: Survival Grilled Fish
effect: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1350 HP.
description: Keqing's specialty. This dish was not grilled. Instead, it was fried from within through the delicate application of Electro. A gentle bite reveals fragrant fish under the lightly-charred skin, its taste perfectly balanced. So, is this how she survives in the wild? You really can't judge a book by its cover.
source: Keqing's specialty dish from cooking Grilled Tiger Fish.
